price: بې شكه زما پر (سوچه) بندګانو به ستا كوم برلاسى نه وي، او ستا رب د ساتونكي په توګه بس دى.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun wakafā birabbika wakīlan
